maqras.text: 36|60|He adama santana! Ma'i tomalokaka e'i marme nirdesa diya nachilone ye, tomaloke cayatanara ibadata nakaraiba, karana si tomalokara prakasya satrau
36|61|arau kerala morae'i ibadata karaa, e'itorae'i sarala patha.
36|62|Arau cayatane tomalokara bahu dalaka bibhraanta karaichila, tathapi'o tomaloke anudharana karaa na'ine
36|63|e'itorae'i se'i jahannama, yara pratisrauti tomalokaka diya haichila.
36|64|Tomaloke ye kupharai karaichila tara babe aji tomaloke iyata dagdha horaa.
36|65|Aji ami sihamtara mukhata mohara marai dima, sihamtara hate amara lagata katha patiba arau sihamtara bharaiye saksya diba sihamtara krtakarmara.
36|66|Arau ami iccha karaile arasye sihamtara cakuboraka lopa karai dilohemtena, tetiya sihamte patha anbesanata dauraile'o (kono kamata nahiba) karana kenekaino dekha paba
36|67|arau ami iccha karaile sihamtara nija nija sthanata sihamtara akrti paraibartana karai dilohemtena, phalata sihamte aguraa'iyo yaba noraarailehemtena arau ubhati'o ahiba noraarailehemtena.
36|68|Arau ami yaka dirgha jirana dana karao, srsti arayabata tara aranati ghata'om. Tathapi'o sihamte buji napayane
36|69|ami te'omka (raachulaka) kabya racana karaa sikoraa na'i arau e'ito te'omra babe sobhaniya'o nahaya. Niscaya e'ito kerala eta upadesa arau suspasta kora'ana
36|70|yate i jiraitasakalaka satarka karaiba parae arau kaphirasakalara biraud'dhe sastira katha satya buli pramanita haya.
36|71|Sihamte laksya karaa na'ine ye, amara haterae prastuta karaa bastusamuhara majata ami sihamtara babe gharaciya jantu'o srsti karaicho. Sihamte'i se'iborara malika.
36|72|Arau ami se'iboraka sihamtara basibhuta karai dicho. Phalata se'iborara kichu sankhyaka haiche sihamtara bahana arau kichumanaka sihamte bhaksana karae.
36|73|Arau sihamtara babe e'iborara majata ache bahuto upakara lagate ache paniya upadana. Tathapi'o sihamte krtajnata prakasa nakaraibane
36|74|athaca sihamte allahara paraibarte an'ya ilaha grahana karaiche, e'i asata ye, sihamte sahayyapraapta ha’ba.
36|75|Kintu se'iborae sihamtaka sahaya karaibalai saksama nahaya, baram se'iboraka sihamtara biraud'dhe bahiniraupe upasthita karaa ha’ba.
36|76|Eteke sihamtara kathaya yena tomaka cintita nakarae, niscaya ami jano yi sihamte gopana karae arau yi sihamte prakasa karae.
36|77|Manuhe laksya karaa na'ine ye, ami taka srsti karaicho sukrabindura paraa, athaca pichata si prakasya bitandakarai hai parae.
36|78|Arau si amara bisaye upama racana karae, athaca si nijara srstira katha paharai yaya. Si kaya, ‘asthira bhitarata kone praana sancara karaiba yetiya i jahi-khahi, geli-paci yaba’
36|79|koraa, ‘teraemi tata praana sancara karaiba yijane iyaka prathamabara srsti karaiche, arau te'om pratito srsti samparke samyaka paraijnata’.
36|80|Teraemi tomalokara babe se'ujiya gachara paraa ju'i utpanna karae, phalata tomaloke tara paraa agni prajbalita karaa.
36|81|Yijane akasasamuha arau prthirai srsti karaiche te'om sihamtara anuraupa akau srsti karaibalai saksama nahayane? Niscaya haya. Te'om mahasrasta, sarbajna.
36|82|Te'omra bisayato enekuraa ye, te'om yetiya kono bastura iccha karae, tetiya kerala kaya, ‘ha’, phalata se'ito hai yaya.
36|83|Eteke paraitra arau mahana se'i satta, yara hatata pratyeka bisayara sarbabhauma kartrtba; arau te'omra ocarate'i tomaloka pratyarartita ha’ba.
37|1|Sapata saraibad'dha phiraistasakalara
37|2|tara pichata kathora paraicalakasakalara
37|3|arau upadesa grantha tilaratakaraisakalara
37|4|niscaya tomalokara ilaha ejana
37|5|yijana akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora madhyararti sakalo bastura raba arau udayasthala samuharao raba.
37|6|Niscaya ami nikatararti akasakhanaka naksatraraajira saundaryarae susobhita karaicho
37|7|arau raksa karaicho pratyeka bidraohi cayatanara paraa.
37|8|Phalata sihamte urd'dhajagatara ekorae suniba noraarae, karana ke'uphalara paraa sihamtara prati niksepa karaa haya (ulkapinda)
37|9|sihamtaka khedi pathi'oraara babe, arau sihamtara babe ache abiraama sasti.
37|10|Kintu hathat konoba'i kiba sunile jbalanta ulkapinda'i tara piche piche khedi yaya.
37|11|Eteke sihamtaka sudhi coraacona, srstira ksetrata sihamte bechi jatila ne ami ana yibora srsti karaicho se'ibora? Ami sihamtaka dekhuna alatiya matira paraa srsti karaicho.
37|12|Baram tumi bismaya bodha karaicha, arau sihamte bidraupa karai ache.
37|13|Arau yetiya sihamtaka upadesa diya haya, tetiya sihamte seya grahana nakarae.
37|14|Arau yetiya sihamte kono nidarsana dekhe, tetiya sihamte upahasa karae.
37|15|Arau kaya, ‘e'ito dekhuna suspasta yadura bahirae ana eko nahaya.
37|16|‘Ami yetiya mrtyubarana karaima lagate mati arau asthita parainata hama, tathapi'o amaka punaraut'thita karaa ha’bane
37|17|‘arau amara pitr-purausa sakaloko’
37|18|koraa, ‘haya, arau tomaloka ha’ba lanchita’.
37|19|Eteke seya kerala eta matra pracanda dhamaka, tatksanat sihamte thara lagi ca'i thakiba.
37|20|Arau sihamte ka’ba, ‘haya! Durbhagya amara! E'ito dekhuna pratidana dirasa’.
37|21|E'itorae'i phayacalara dina, yi bisaye tomaloke abisbasa karaichila.
